title: This is open source framework for people who are interested to start their way in leaning programming

episodes.title: Learning Background
episodes.description: This is the point when you don't know anything about programming yet, but I would like to try and you don't know from where sto start

steps.title: Step 0 / Basic with Python
steps.description: Base python course, learn basic and become familiar with terminology

steps.title: Step 1 / Fundamentals of OOP with Java
steps.description: Head First Java is a great book for those who already know what is code

steps.title: Step 2 / Became familiar with Design Patters
steps.description: Head First Design Patters contains explanation for most popular patters developer will require

steps.title: Step 3 / Head First Object-Oriented Analysis & Design
steps.description: Head First Object-Oriented Analysis & Design shows you how to analyze, design, and write serious object-oriented software

steps.title: Step 4 / Head First Software Development
steps.description: Head First Software Development guide you through the best practices of software development
